author: K. Thor Jensen
title: What to Watch if You've Given Up on 'The Walking Dead' - Slideshow from PCMag.com
text:
What to Watch if You've Given Up on 'The Walking Dead' What to Watch if You've Given Up on 'The Walking Dead' Click To View Slideshow Â» If you can't handle this season, and that leaves a hole in your TV schedule, we can help. 
We can't think of a TV premiere in recent memory that has pissed people off quite as much as season seven of The Walking Dead . Yes, we all knew a character was going to die. If you read the comics, you knew that it was somebody you really liked. But somehow the showrunners made it so much worse. 
The premiere was about as pleasurable as going to the dentist, a seemingly unending reel of torture porn that went on and on and on as Negan broke Rick down to a helpless wreck who wanted only to serve him. Obviously the arc of the season is going to be Rick finding himself again and resisting, but haven't we already seen that at least once? What more mileage can the show wring out of Andrew Lincoln staring dead-eyed into the camera lens? 
Plenty of people are taking this as an opportunity to walk away from The Walking Dead (and Fear The Walking Dead , which is bad in completely different ways). If you're one of them and this leaves a hole in your TV schedule, we can help. Here are nine shows you can slot in its place for a significantly improved experience.
